name: DRON (dron.game)
description:
IMPORTANT INFO

-> Make sure to use fullscreen button in the bottom right of the game for optimal experience.

-> If the game does not load correctly try our executable version for download.

REQUIREMENTS

-> Make sure your PC has the screen size in 100% 

-> At the moment the game only works in computer screens with FullHD (1920x1080).

DESCRIPTION

DRON is a auto-scrolling shoot'em up with roguelike elements.

It is a Browser game, however, it can also be installed as a desktop application for all major operative systems (Windows, MacOs and Linux). It can't be played on a mobile device.

You are in control of a delivery drone called Dron. Several obstacles will try to stop you along your way. 

In true roguelike fashion you'll have to restart from the beginning every time you game over.

Along the journey you will also encounter extra Waves and exciting bosses.

And, if the player wants to engage try-hard mode, then great... because there will also be an online leaderboard to fight for.

Fight with Dron and defeat the evil corp Amazinga!.
